content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 Mar 2019I find it tough to begin on financial analysis, there is so many numbers, ratios to think about... is there a certain method you guys use to learn quicker eg. Examples, walkthroughs that I can use?I am a beginner but eager to learn!2 answersAnswerBump0

ELEdmund LeeLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 25 Mar 2019You should google/learn technical analysis. That teaches you on moving average, learning the golden cross and the dead cross. Reading different chart and recognizing pattern. Knowing the support level and the resistance level blah blah blah. I feel like it's more interesting than fundamental analysis but they are both still important and since you are eager to learn, try to google or read up on both :D ohhhhh I think sgx have a few courses for free not sure if they are of any use but worth a shot Good luck0 comments1
